titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress commemorating the heroism and lifetime achievements of the late General James H. "Jimmy" Doolittle, who died on September 27, 1993.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12866-12867)
Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 9/30/1993--Introduced. Expresses the thanks of the Nation in memory of General James H. "Jimmy" Doolittle, hero, aviation pioneer, scientist, and patriot, for his lifetime of service.
